title: Russia demands an apology after Cyprus arrests a Russian journalist reportedly for security reasons
description: Cyprus authorities have arrested a Russian journalist for “security reasons,” prompting the Russian Foreign Ministry to demand a formal apology from the Cypriot government over the “provocation.”

title: Vermont's flood-damaged capital is slowly rebuilding. And it's asking tourists and residents to help
description: Nearly three months after severe flooding inundated Vermont’s capital city, Montpelier is celebrating how much progress has been made with a two-day reopening event

title: Simone Biles wins 6th all-around title, becomes most decorated gymnast in history
description: Simone Biles has won the individual all-around title at the world championships for the sixth time to become the most decorated gymnast in history

title: McCarthy denies reports he was considering resigning before term ends
description: McCarthy was ousted as House speaker on Tuesday.

title: FTX founder slept on bean bag at $35M Bahamas apartment: Witness
description: Adam Yedidia, who worked as a developer at FTX, testified Alameda, Bankman-Fried’s privately controlled hedge fund, paid for the apartment.

title: Family sentenced to federal prison for selling 'dangerous,' fake COVID-19 cure: DOJ
description: A Florida family who claimed they had a "miracle" cure for COVID-19 that contained a toxic bleach were sentenced to federal prison on Friday.

title: Doctor pleads not guilty to charges he sexually assaulted women he met on dating apps
description: Dr. Stephen Matthews, 35, a board-certified cardiologist and internal medicine physician, pleaded not guilty to 51 counts, including sexual assault and drugging.

title: UNC professor killed in office was shot 7 times, medical examiner says
description: Zijie Yan, an associate professor in the university's Department of Applied Physical Sciences, was shot seven times, according to an autopsy report.

title: Georgia will be first state with medical marijuana in pharmacies
description: Georgia soon will become the first state in the nation to offer medical marijuana products at independent pharmacies

title: WATCH:  Puppy reunited with family after being lost in Maui fires
description: "The story of Roman is one of perseverance and hope."

title: Nurse named as prime suspect in mysterious death of Afrobeat star MohBad
description: Police in Nigeria have identified a nurse as the “principal suspect” in the mysterious death of a Nigerian Afrobeat star which triggered dayslong protests demanding justice

title: Lawyers: Election denier, 'MyPillow Guy' Lindell out of money, can't pay legal bills
description: Attorneys who’ve been defending MyPillow chief executive and election denier Mike Lindell against defamation lawsuits by voting machine companies are seeking court permission to quit

title: Authorities probe fatal crash involving Sen. Bob Menendez's wife
description: The crash killed a man while Nadine Menendez was driving at night.

title: Former Army sergeant indicted for efforts to give classified information to China
description: Former Army Sgt. Joseph Daniel Schmidt was indicted Friday for efforts to give classified information to China, according to the Department of Justice.

title: 115 bodies found improperly stored at funeral home
description: A funeral home offering environmentally friendly burials is under investigation after it was discovered that human remains were being improperly stored.

title: Cyberattack at MGM Resorts expected to cost casino giant $100 million
description: The data breach that MGM Resorts is calling a cyberattack is expected to cost the casino giant more than $100 million, the Las Vegas-based company says

title: Man charged in connection with alleged plot to kidnap UK TV host Holly Willoughby
description: A 36-year-old man has been ordered to remain in custody in connection with an alleged plot to kidnap and murder one of Britain’s most high-profile television personalities

title: Giving birth in a war zone: The struggles of many Syrian mothers
description: Bombing, displacement and devastating earthquakes have created a hostile environment for pregnant women and mothers in northwestern Syria.

title: Inside Trump's earlier secret bid for speaker as McCarthy nomination drama unfolded
description: From ABC News Chief Washington Correspondent Jonathan Karl's upcoming book.

title: Police officers won't face charges in fatal shooting of protester at 'Cop City'
description: No Georgia State Police troopers involved in the fatal shooting of Manuel "Tortuguita" Teran will face charges, according to District Attorney George R. Christian.

title: Eligible electric, plug-in vehicle buyers will get US tax credits immediately in 2024
description: Starting next year, people who want to buy a new or used electric or plug-in hybrid vehicle will be able to get U.S. income tax credits at the time of purchase

title: Man who bred dogs for illegal fighting for decades sentenced to 7 years in prison
description: A man who bred dogs for fighting for decades, selling them worldwide and exhibiting "extraordinary cruelty,” has been sentenced to seven years in prison

title: Woman arrested after gunshots fired in Connecticut police station
description: Authorities say a woman is under arrest after she fired several gunshots inside a Connecticut police station

title: Prada to design NASA's new next-gen spacesuits
description: Italian Luxury fashion house Prada has announced it is to partner with Axiom Space to design and develop NASA’s next generation lunar spacesuits.

title: American tourist arrested for smashing ancient Roman statues at a museum in Israel
description: Israeli police have arrested an American tourist at the Israel Museum in Jerusalem after he hurled works of art to the floor, damaging two second-century Roman statues

title: Giraffe feces seized at the border from woman who planned to make necklaces with it
description: A box of giraffe feces was seized and destroyed by U.S. Customs and Border Protection after a woman brought it back from a trip to Kenya and planned to make necklaces.

title: Jailed Iranian activist Narges Mohammadi wins Nobel Peace Prize
description: Jailed Iranian activist Narges Mohammadi won the Nobel Peace Prize on Friday.

title: Russian lawmakers will consider rescinding ratification of global nuclear test ban
description: The speaker of the Russian parliament says lawmakers will consider revoking the ratification of a global nuclear test ban

title: Economic spotlight turns to US jobs data as markets are roiled by high rates
description: Job growth in the United States has remained resilient for the past 2 1/2 years even after high inflation flared and the Federal Reserve jacked up interest rates at the fastest pace in four decades

title: Fire sweeps through a 6-story residential building in Mumbai, killing 6
description: A fire in a six-story residential building has left at least six dead and another 38 injured in Mumbai, India’s financial and entertainment capital

title: Trump drops $500 million lawsuit against former attorney Michael Cohen
description: Former President Donald Trump has dropped a $500 million lawsuit he had filed against his former attorney Michael Cohen that alleged Cohen breached his fiduciary duty.
